attributes.action: Introduce a mandatory 5 year jail sentence for anyone found carrying a knife or offensive weapon on a public street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more youths carry knives these days under the pretence of self defence. I feel that urgent action is required to prevent further loss of innocent lives. I believe that the judiciary has failed to protect the public by passing inane sentences to thugs which roam our strets unchecked.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
